mapper.insert:

group_id ,

) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_back_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{source_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{price,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{now_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,

#{add_depre,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,

#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_back_no, ass_card_no, source_id, price, now_depre, now_manage_depre, add_depre, add_manage_depre, cur_money, fore_money, note FROM ASS_BACK_SOURCE_Other WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_back_no = #{ass_back_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and source_id = #{source_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
